attributes.action: Make bus stops safe with cameras & security
attributes.additional_details: We need these cameras at bus stops to keep people & children safe whilst waiting , it’s important to keep our community safe
attributes.background: In light of recent events & loss of Bobbie Anne I erg the council & goverment to make bus stops safe with surveillance cameras to keep our children & loved ones safe

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Installing CCTV equipment would be a matter for local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
